event.description: {CovLStrv2{A secret, such as a password, cryptographic key, or token is stored in plaintext directly in the source code, in an application's properties, or configuration file. Users with access to the secret may then use the secret to access resources that they otherwise would not have access to. Secret type: Password (generic).}}
